He was known for his role as Charles Johnson in Citizen Smith and recently as Maester Aemon in Game of Thrones. Vaughan was born on 4 April 1923 in Wem, Shropshire, England.Peter Vaughan Biography (1923-) He was married to Billie Whitelaw from 1952 until they divorced in 1966. He was married to Lillias Walker until his death in 2016.
